const Nav = ({ nav, textLang }) => { return(
{textLang['nav'][0]}
{textLang['nav'][1]}
{textLang['nav'][2]}
{textLang['nav'][3]}
{textLang['nav'][4]}
{textLang['nav'][5]}
) } export default Nav;
